pageProduct.name: Thursday Plantation Aloe Vera Gel 30g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Thursday Plantation Aloe Vera Gel can be used to relief from sunburn, minor burns and other minor skin irritation.

Thursday Plantation Aloe Vera Gel a natural moisturiser and emollient extracted from the Aloe vera plant, essential to have in the medicine cabinet.

Size: 30g

Oil-Free?: Yes

Skin Type: Combination| Dry| Normal| Oily

KEY FEATURES

• Aids the relief of sunburn and minor burns
• Aids the relief of chafing rashes and other minor skin irritations.
• 99.5% naturally derived
• Unscented and non-greasy for all over body care
• Readily absorbed
• Suitable for all skin types

Warnings

Skin patch test prior to use, if sensitivity occurs discontinue use. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Keep out of reach of children. Do not use if foil seal at mouth of tube is broken.

Ingredients

Active Ingredients: Aloe vera inner leaf juice equiv. to fresh 974 mg/g.

Contains: Hydroxybenzoates, Diazolidinylurea, Potassium Sorbate and Sodium benzoate.

Directions

Apply liberally as often as required.

SAFETY DIRECTIONS

For the treatment of minor burns: Immediately apply cold water to the burn for at least 20 minutes prior to use. Medical advice should be sought for the treatment of more serious burns.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.
